name: Gorgeous Ghost
description:
Put makeup on a ghost. Try not to overdo it.

CONTROLS: Click and hold to apply makeup. Click on a different brush to choose it. Click done when done.

You cannot undo your mistakes, but that's OK because you won't make any.

Made in 1h for the One Hour Game Jam

Game and "artwork"  by Hannah Rose. Technically the player too I guess.

Royalty free music by BenSound
